title: Project Hoodie Release?
body: You guys stated it would be about October 2016. Well it's October with no announcement. Can we get an update on release or something?

replies.body: From what I understand, there was a delay in shipment due to hurricane matthew.  Those who made preorders also received an email with information and updates.  I don't have anymore visibility on that, but you can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our merch team can offer context.  Hope that helps!

Didn't get the email so i'm going to the support group. Thanks so much Porocles.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
